name: Skunch [beta]
description:
Something is wrong in Jerome's rainforest home. Can you bounce him through the levels and collect coins for Jerome's child support payments?

CONTROLS -

use the mouse and gravity to bounce Jerome through the levels. 
left mouse - moves jerome in the direction of the cursor

right mouse - stops jerome 

TIPS  -

be patient

everything makes music noises, try making a beat instead of trying too hard

have fun

maybe smoke some weed if you're down with that shit idk

sometimes jerome can complete levels on his own if you fuck off and let gravity do things

this game is unfinished and has bugs. level 4 is also a massive difficulty spike due to this game being unfinished. things are subject to change in the final version.

final version will consist of a windows .exe and an html5 browser version exclusive to newgrounds.com
